title: IHE Patient Identifier Cross-referencing for Mobile
introduction:
## The IHE Patient Identifier Cross-referencing for Mobile (PIXm)
This IHE Implementation Guide provides RESTful transactions for mobile and lightweight browser-based applications to create, update and delete Patient Resources in a Patient Identifier Cross-reference Manager and to query the Patient Identifier Cross-reference Manager for a list of patient identifiers assigned to the same patient person by the Patient Identifier Cross-reference Manager.

list.desc: Continuous Integration Build (latest in version control)
Public Comment release for first IG authored version
